infos.name: Varianten als Tabelle im Produktdetail darstellen
infos.description:
Präsentiere alle Varianten eines Artikels übersichtlich in Tabellenform auf der Produktdetailseite.

Du bestimmst selbst, welche Spalten die Tabelle enthält und welche Informationen zu den jeweiligen Varianten Deinen Kunden ausgespielt werden soll.

Du kannst zwischen zwei Designs wählen (Standard und Kompakt)

Das Plugin gibt Dir die Möglichkeit, die Standard-Variantenbuttons auszublenden.

Bei Variantenartikeln mit Grundpreisberechnung wird dieser mit in der Tabelle angezeigt.

Responsive Design - Umbruch der Tabellenzellen in mobiler Version.

Ermögliche es Deinen Kunden, Varianten schnell und unkompliziert zu vergleichen und direkt über die Tabellenübersicht zum Warenkorb hinzuzufügen.

Passe die Tabelle farblich an das Design Deines Online Shops an.

Einstellungen für das Plugin sind auf Subshop-Ebene möglich.

Passe die Beschreibung der einzelnen Spalten ganz einfach über die Textbausteine individuell nach Deinen Wünschen an.

infos.name: Show Variants as a Table on the Product Detail Page
infos.description:
Present all variants of an item clearly in table form on the product detail page.

Choose which columns the table contains and which information to display.

Choose between two designs (standard and compact)

The plugin gives you the option to hide the standard variant buttons.

In the case of variant articles with a basic price calculation, the basic price is also displayed in the table.

Responsive Design - breaking up the table cells in the mobile version.

Make it possible for your customers to compare variants quickly and easily and to add them to the shopping cart directly via the table overview.

Adjust the color of the table to match the design of your online shop.

Settings for the plugin are possible at subshop level.

Use the text modules to adapt the description of the individual columns to suit your individual needs.

Installation service for Shopware plugins

Downloading, installing, activating and configuring plugins can take a lot of  time - save this time by letting our experts do everything that‘s necessary. While you get back to taking care of the really  important things, our experienced staff will install the plugin for you. The  one-time fee for the setup is 49,99€, on StageWare 99€*.
* The price is exclusive VAT.

Support

Our customers appreciate our fast and competent support. It‘s  particularly important to us that we make our customers more successfull in the  long term. Which is why our professional support team is always available to our  customers. If you have any questions, please send us an email at team@zwei.gmbh or call us at  +49 (0) 8086 – 35 19 850. 

ZweiPunkt GmbH – The full service agency for your Shopware online shop

With us you get everything from one source. Thanks to years of  experience in shop development, we offer our customers professional support in  all areas of Shopware 5 & 6. We support you from the establishment of  your e-shop or the redesign, to the optimization of  your shop performance or individual plugin development up to search engine optimization and marketing.

In recent years, our experts have acquired a great deal of  knowledge about Shopware, which they not only in the development of  individually adapted extensions for your online shop, but also  in the development of plugins that we offer in the official Shopware Store.

You can find all the information about how we can support you with your Shopware  online shop on our website www.zwei.gmbh.

infos.installationManual:
• Install the plugin on your Shopware 6 backend
  • Activate the plugin
  • Open the plugin to configure it
  • Configure the settings for the respective shop
  • Define which columns should be displayed within the table
  • Customize the design of the table according to your needs
  • The table texts can be easily adjusted in the text modules on your Shopware 6 backend
infos.shortDescription: All variants of an item can be clearly displayed in a table on the product detail page with this plugin. The table information and view are customizable.
infos.highlights:
Variants as a table on the product detail page. Settings at subshop level
Responsive Design - SEO optimized table
Basic price display within the table
Table columns, texts and design can be customized
Add products directly from the table to the shopping cart
infos.features:
Variant table
Customizable options (e.g. texts, columns, design)
Basic price display for variant articles with price calculation according to the basic price
Comparison of all variants of an article
Add variants to the shopping cart quickly and easily
The standard variant buttons can be hidden
